mapper.select: SELECT /* CustomerProblemMapper.getCustomerProblemRegistDetail */ A.cust_nm , A.req_desc , A.cust_mbl , A.prgs_sts , D1.cd_val as prgs_sts_val , A.crte_dttm , A.prbm_cd , D2.cd_val as cust_prbm , A.prbm_dgr FROM reg_cust_prbm A LEFT OUTER JOIN cmn_cd_dtl D1 on D1.ctg_cd = 'sts-cd' AND A.prgs_sts = D1.cmn_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN cmn_cd_dtl D2 on D2.ctg_cd = 'prbm-cd' AND A.prbm_cd = D2.cmn_cd WHERE A.reg_id = #{registID}

SELECT /* CustomerProblemMapper.getCustomerProblemMappingAgentList */ C.agnt_nm , C.agnt_regn_cd , D.cd_val as agent_regn_val FROM prbm_reg_agnt_mpp B LEFT OUTER JOIN prbm_cust_agnt C on B.agnt_id = C.agnt_id LEFT OUTER JOIN cmn_cd_dtl D on D.ctg_cd = 'regn-cd' AND C.agnt_regn_cd = D.cmn_cd WHERE B.reg_id = #{registID}
